name: prendus-question-elements
description: Fully embeddable custom HTML elements for Prendus questions.

scripts.test-window: npm run build-static && cp package.json test/package.json && cd test && npm install && cd .. && rm -rf test/node_modules/prendus-question-elements && mkdir test/node_modules/prendus-question-elements && cp -r dist test/node_modules/prendus-question-elements/dist && electron --enable-logging node_modules/scram-engine/main.js --entry-file test/index.html --window

author: Jordan Last <jordan.michael.last@gmail.com>
